description: The Tind Hoodie has been one of our best selling pieces. The relaxed, yet elegant off-duty style, seems to be just what people want to wear right now. The fabric is knitted with a jacquard structure in a yarn that is washable on wool setting. Practical and chic! The hoodie has ribbed cuffs on the sleeves and hem. The hood has an over-lap in center front, which makes the fabric drape nicely around your neck. Wear it with the matching Tind Pants for a complete look.
name: We Norwegians Tind Hoodie - Mens
